review: Very easy to set up, It turned my Samsung TV into a Smart TV, I love it.
author: Kip Vidrine

review: I have used the Wii and I have roku. The Fire Stick is amazing!!!!!!
author: michael j santoro

review: Easy to set up, my only problem is that it will not play through my TV Guardian, (Foul Language Filter).
author: Larry Matthews

review: Always "catching up" makes it hard to watch anything. Got it free by buying 3 months of Sling TV... Disappointed with it
author: Scott Miller

review: So happy we purchased this we just love it!
author: Pat Hawks

review: I love it!!! Had it up and running within 10 minutes..stayed up all night catching up on Netflix shows!!
author: Angela Morrison

review: This device works exactly as I'd hoped.  Initially I experienced an insufficient connection to my wifi, but when I enabled 802.11 "n" capability on my wireless router everything clicked.  Now I can enjoy a wide range of choices in video and music thru Amazon Prime and other apps.
author: George T

review: ?do u have to already have wifi or dose it comes with built in wifi
author: fallon

review: I wasn't sure what I could expect for $39, but absolutely love this. Super easy to hook up and use. We watch lots of movies and TV shows with this.
author: unk1234
